Uses of Interface
wekabci.server.protocol.Message

Packages that use Message
wekabci.server.protocol   
 

Uses of Message in wekabci.server.protocol
 

Classes in wekabci.server.protocol that implement Message
 class AbstractMessage
          Abstract class for all the valid messages in the Protocol.
 class Bye
          This message closes the connection to the client.
 class Classifier
          This message loads a particular classifier for the thread communication, then gets into a new state to start classifying signals.
 class Halt
          This message shuts down the WekaServer.
 class Hello
          This is the basic hand shaking message, expected to move from a new connection to a ready to process messages connection.
 class Ping
          Simple message just to check if the communication with the server is all right.
 class Save
          This message indicates the thread to save all the data coming from the client into a file.
 class Show
          This message return a list of the available classifiers on the server.
 class Signal
          The most important message, used to receive a brain signal from the BCI program, it is classified and then predicted class is returned.
 class Stop
          The Stop message stops the thread from classifying signals and returns to the ready state, this is useful if a new classifier wants to be loaded for this thread.
